Options.Text: I like rhythmic and expressive tunes
I like calm and ambient sounds
I like energetic and fast-paced beats
I like playful and cheerful melodies

Questions.Question: What role do you usually take in a group project?

Options.Text: I like leading and organizing the team
I like supporting quietly from the background
I like keeping the mood light and fun
I like contributing creative ideas

Questions.Question: What’s your favorite time of day?

Options.Text: I like early mornings when it's peaceful
I like late nights when I can reflect
I like afternoons when I’m most productive
I like evenings when I can socialize
I like achieving goals with my team
I like expressing myself creatively
I like discovering new things
I like making others smile

Options.Text: Exploring new places with friends
Singing, dancing, or performing
Relaxing somewhere quiet and peaceful
Speeding through a challenge or race

I am quiet but observant

Results.Title: You are an Orca!
Results.Description: Smart, strategic, and fiercely loyal. You thrive in teams and always know how to get what you want.

Results.Title: You are a Humpback Whale!
Results.Description: You are expressive, creative, and love to make a splash. Just like the humpback, your songs and stories captivate everyone around you.

Results.Title: You are a Blue Whale!
Results.Description: You are calm, majestic, and the gentle giant of your group. You carry great wisdom and move through life with grace.

Results.Title: You are a Beluga!
Results.Description: Playful, social, and full of charm. You love connecting with others and bringing joy to your pod.

Results.Title: You are a Beaked Whale!
Results.Description: Mysterious and elusive, you prefer the quiet depths. You are observant, thoughtful, and full of surprises.

Results.Title: You are a Short-finned Pilot Whale!
Results.Description: You are social, loyal, and love being part of a close-knit group. You thrive in community and value strong bonds.

Results.Title: You are a Minke Whale!
Results.Description: Fast, agile, and always on the move. You are quick-witted and love a good challenge.
